ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Help
ygData.msgSnippet: Not really trying to argue here  but I have canceled my account 3 different times for RL things. Granted, the longest time I was away was only 4 months. But
ygData.messageBody:
Not really trying to argue here  but I have canceled my account 3 different times for RL things. Granted, the longest time I was away was only 4 months. But when I logged back on, all was well. Nothing moved, no gear missing... I litterally did pick up where I left off.

Maybe accounts that go inactive for a year or more can have problems though.

 Su <suceress@...> wrote:


> > Second off, old accounts can NOT be reactivated just like that.
> > EverQuest holds onto your unused and unpaid for accounts for six
> > months before deleting it.
> No, they guarantee they won't delete accounts for 6 months, but they
> have never yet actually deleted an inactive account. I know of several
> people who have returned after a year or more and just reactivated their
> account
> Matt
>
Well, I have heard reports of people having their gear and money deleted
while their characters and levels were still there. So there's no guarantee
that you can just pick up where you left off.
luv,
-Su



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com

The happiness you seek is right where you left it.
